data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 14651, Version Hash: 05273b109bbf775536938c01a1ba710d1c61d86c
data.actual_result: An editable text area shows up where you can edit the message and save it by pressing enter or even delete it by removing all text and then pressing enter
data.expected_result: Message that you want to pin/delete shows up, or not being able to do step 3/4
data.short_description: Message is delete-able/editable while trying to pin it or delete it
data.steps_to_repro: - Type and send a message - Right click it - Press tab - Press up-arrow - Click pin message or delete message
